SEARCH

Class NewsApiJsonParser

java.lang.Object
JsonParser
NewsApiJsonParser
public class NewsApiJsonParser extends JsonParser
A parser for extracting valid articles from the News API response in various formats. This class provides methods to parse JSON data from multiple sources, including files, input streams, strings, and URLs, into a list of valid `NewsApiArticle` objects. It validates articles by checking for required fields such as title, description, published date-time, and URL. Invalid articles are logged and excluded from the final list, while valid articles are written to a text file for storage or further processing.
See Also:

  • NewsApiResponse
